nodes.text: The Naos sharptooth was a pink-fleshed fish native to Naos III. It spawned only in the coldest months of the already-cold year. Exportation of the sharptooth - a massively expensive delicacy across the galaxy - was the prime and only export of the moon. Other than the occasional rich tourist fisherman, all sharptooth business was controlled by the Naos III Mercantile.
